alert.note: Alert for Garden; Grant; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 8:27PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Grant, northern Garden and southeastern Sheridan Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 727 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ellsworth, or 24 miles east of Alliance, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Watson Lake, Patterson Lake, Finnegan Lake, Kincaid Lake, Kennedy Lake, Wild Horse Flats, Snow Lake, Bingham, Wickson Lake, Lakeside, Wolf Hill, Herman Lake and Jerry Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 14. Highway 2 between mile markers 102 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
